channel.title: CVE Feed for claudiosanches -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for claudiosanches -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1718|2024-08-01T18:48:21.743Z -- claudiosanches -- claudio%20sanches%20%E2%80%93%20checkout%20cielo%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Claudio Sanches – Checkout Cielo for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to insufficient payment validation in the update_order_status() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the status of orders to paid bypassing payment.

item.title: CVE-2024-3934|2024-07-20T03:20:31.151Z -- claudiosanches -- mercado%20pago%20payments%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Mercado Pago payments for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Path Traversal in versions 7.3.0 to 7.5.1 via the mercadopagoDownloadLog function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to download and read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information. The arbitrary file download was patched in 7.5.1, while the missing authorization was corrected in version 7.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-1718|2024-06-05T13:51:33.749Z -- claudiosanches -- claudio%20sanches%20%E2%80%93%20checkout%20cielo%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Claudio Sanches – Checkout Cielo for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to insufficient payment validation in the update_order_status() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the status of orders to paid bypassing payment.

item.title: CVE-2024-3934|2024-07-29T15:53:36.777Z -- claudiosanches -- mercado%20pago%20payments%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Mercado Pago payments for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Path Traversal in versions 7.3.0 to 7.5.1 via the mercadopagoDownloadLog function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to download and read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information. The arbitrary file download was patched in 7.5.1, while the missing authorization was corrected in version 7.6.2.
